column5: 2019.------The Prek Tamak bridge crosses the Mekong River
column6: and links Kandal with Prey Veng province and Vietnam.------The construction of the bridge took about 50 months and cost about US $ 43.5 million. The bridge was commissioned in 2010. ------SOURCE
